pr_title: Function to round a time value

timeline.message: Function to round a time value

timeline.bodyText: Use roundToNearest.longValue() and cache it for performance concern.
timeline.author: Jackie-Jiang

replies.bodyText: We apply this on the stream, which presumably has different input values coming in (e.g. millis). Not sure how we can cache it?
replies.author: mcvsubbu

replies.bodyText: But using long is better, yes.
replies.author: mcvsubbu

replies.bodyText: changed to roundToNearest.longValue and cached it
replies.author: npawar

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
               * Round the given time value to nearest rounding bucket
          
          
            
               * Round the given time value to nearest multiple
          
          
            
               * @return the original value but rounded to the nearest multiple of @param roundToNearest
timeline.author: mcvsubbu
